tr_quotes.quote: Para iyi hizmetçi, kötü bir efendidir.
tr_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

tr_quotes.quote: En küçük para bile, bazen hayatımızı değiştirebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Murat Ertan

tr_quotes.quote: Para insanı avlamak için en iyi yemdir.
tr_quotes.author: Thomas Fuller

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada üç şey saklanamaz: Aşk, duman ve parasızlık.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Parayı köleniz yapın, yoksa efendiniz olur.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın fethedemeyeceği kadar, sağlam bir kale yoktur.
tr_quotes.author: M. T. Cicero

tr_quotes.quote: Paran varsa; insanlar seni tanır. Paran yoksa sen insanları tanırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın öldürdüğü ruh, kılıcın öldürdüğü bedenden fazladır.
tr_quotes.author: Walter Scott

tr_quotes.quote: Para ya bizim başımızın belası veya bizim hizmetkarımızdır.
tr_quotes.author: Horatius

tr_quotes.quote: Cebinize giren her meteliğin, hesabını tutmayı unutmayın.
tr_quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

tr_quotes.quote: Parasız düşünür; ama paralı iki misli düşünür.
tr_quotes.author: Mihayloviç Dostoyevski

tr_quotes.quote: Para hırsı, atom bombasından çok daha fazla insanı öldürmüştür.
tr_quotes.author: Grev Palast

tr_quotes.quote: Para gübreye benzer, yayılmadığı sürece pek işe yaramaz.
tr_quotes.author: Francis Bacon

tr_quotes.quote: Paraya fazla güvenin olmasın, fakat onu güvenilir bir yere koy.
tr_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

tr_quotes.quote: Para aracılığı ile zaman kazanmak gerekirken, yaşamımızı para kazanmak için tüketiyoruz
tr_quotes.author: Albert Camus

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların büyük bir bölümü şu iki şeyin kullanımından habersizdir: Para ve zaman.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Dünyada üç şey saklanamaz: Aşk, duman ve parasızlık.
tr_quotes.author: Çin Atasözü

tr_quotes.quote: Sahip olan değil, bağışlayan zengindir.
tr_quotes.author: Erich Fromm

tr_quotes.quote: Yazgıların en güzeli, bir insanın sahip olabileceği en büyük hazine, tutkuyla yaptığı bir iş için ona para ödeniyor olmasıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Abraham Maslow

tr_quotes.quote: Sen mi paraya bağlısın, para mı sana bağlı? İşte bu tamamen sana bağlı.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eldeki para hürriyetin aletidir; fakat peşi kovalanan para, tam tersine kölelik aletidir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın değerini anlamak isterseniz borç almaya çalışın.
tr_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

tr_quotes.quote: Para ile insan ilişkisi aynen şöyledir: İnsan paranın sahtesini yapar, para da insanın.
tr_quotes.author: Goethe

tr_quotes.quote: Paraya fazla güvenin olmasın, fakat onu güvenilir bir yere koy.
tr_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

tr_quotes.quote: Para açlığı giderir mutsuzluğu değil, yemek mideyi doyurur ruhu değil.
tr_quotes.author: Bernard Shaw

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanlar sahte para yaparlar; ama çok kere para da sahte insanlar meydana getirir.
tr_quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

tr_quotes.quote: Eldeki para hürriyetin aletidir; fakat peşi kovalanan para, tam tersine kölelik aletidir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın satın alamayacağı bir şeye sahip oluncaya kadar zengin değilsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

tr_quotes.quote: Yeniçağda paranın gittikçe artan bir kuvvet oluşu, ahlak mukavemetinin gittikçe azalmasındandır.
tr_quotes.author: Peyami Safa

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanın kazandığı paradan değil, paranın kazandığı insandan kork!
tr_quotes.author: Necip Fazıl Kısakürek

tr_quotes.quote: Kimse öğüt istemez herkes para ister, demek ki para öğütten daha iyidir.
tr_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

tr_quotes.quote: Paran var derdin var.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Para ile saadet olmaz.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bedel ödenirken para beklenmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Para amaç değil, araç olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan, satın alabildiği kadar zengindir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsan satın alamadıkları kadar fakirdir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Parayı köleniz yapın, yoksa efendiniz olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eldeki para hürriyetin aletidir; fakat peşi kovalanan para, tam tersine kölelik aletidir.
tr_quotes.author: Jean J. Rousseau

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın satın alamayacağı bir şeye sahip oluncaya kadar zengin değilsiniz.
tr_quotes.author: Garth Brooks

tr_quotes.quote: Para mutsuzluğu değil, yoksulluğu giderebilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Kalbi para diye çarpanların ciğeri beş para etmez.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın fazlasına sahipseniz, sadaka vermek insanlık görevidir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Paran varsa; insanlar seni tanır. Paran yoksa sen insanları tanırsın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Eğer zengin olmak istiyorsanız, kazanmak kadar biriktirmeyi de düşünün.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Bir insanın paraya ne kadar kıymet verdiği, kendisinden borç istendiğinde belli olur.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Paranın adı oldukça ve özellikle sende fazlası ile oldukça senin önünde herkes eğilir.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Paranla şeref kazanma, şerefinle para kazan ki; paran bittiğinde, şerefin de bitmesin!
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: İnsanların yapmış olduğu sahte paralardan, paraların yapmış olduğu sahte insanlardan uzak duracaksın.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

tr_quotes.quote: Yaşamayı bir savaş olmaktan kurtarmak isteyen hayatla barışmasını sağlayacak kadar para sahibi olmalıdır.
tr_quotes.author: Anonim

en_quotes.quote: All the money in the world can't buy you back good health
en_quotes.author: Reba McEntire

en_quotes.quote: A rich man is nothing but a poor man with money
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: A successful man is one who makes more money than his wife can spend. A successful woman is one who can find such a man
en_quotes.author: Lana Turner

en_quotes.quote: You can't pay enough money to... cure that feeling of being broken and confused
en_quotes.author: Winona Ryder

en_quotes.quote: There's something about a holiday that isn't all about how much money you spend
en_quotes.author: Hilarie Burton

en_quotes.quote: The American Republic will endure until the day Congress discovers that it can bribe the public with the public's money
en_quotes.author: Alexis de Tocqueville

en_quotes.quote: If you can actually count your money, then you're not a rich man
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: I'm not that lazy, but I don't need that much money. I lead a fairly simple life
en_quotes.author: Karl Pilkington

en_quotes.quote: The problem with socialism is that you eventually run out of other peoples' money
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: Wealth is the ability to fully experience life
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: Victory is everything. You can spend the money but you can never spend the memories
en_quotes.author: Ken Venturi

en_quotes.quote: A bank is a place where they lend you an umbrella in fair weather and ask for it back when it begins to rain
en_quotes.author: Robert Frost

en_quotes.quote: Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: I just thank God that I didn't grow up with so much money or privilege because you had to create ways to make it happen
en_quotes.author: Kim Basinger

en_quotes.quote: Never confuse the size of your paycheck with the size of your talent
en_quotes.author: Marlon Brando

en_quotes.quote: Money doesn't make people happy. People make people happy
en_quotes.author: Steve Wynn

en_quotes.quote: I got a lot of money, but when you wealthy, that mean that your children is ballin', your grandchildren is ballin'
en_quotes.author: YoungBoy Never Broke Again

en_quotes.quote: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: Rule No.1: Never lose money. Rule No.2: Never forget rule No.1
en_quotes.author: Warren Buffett

en_quotes.quote: I have ways of making money that you know nothing of
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: Spending money is much more difficult than making money
en_quotes.author: Jack Ma

en_quotes.quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it
en_quotes.author: David Lee Roth

en_quotes.quote: Money is like manure. You have to spread it around or it smells
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: Of course making money and being able to live life the way one desires is important
en_quotes.author: Chinmayi

en_quotes.quote: I believe that sex is one of the most beautiful, natural, wholesome things that money can buy
en_quotes.author: Steve Martin

en_quotes.quote: Nothing except the mint can make money without advertising
en_quotes.author: Thomas Babington Macaulay

en_quotes.quote: You can lose money, and you can lose all sorts of things, but you can't lose your self-confidence
en_quotes.author: Rex Hunt

en_quotes.quote: I want to go to - what's that hot country with a lot of money? - Dubai
en_quotes.author: Grandmaster Flash

en_quotes.quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: It doesn't take money to turn off the television and cultivate real bonding time
en_quotes.author: Marianne Williamson

en_quotes.quote: For those without money, the road to that treasure house of the imagination begins at the public library
en_quotes.author: Pete Hamill

en_quotes.quote: I have no money, no resources, no hopes. I am the happiest man alive
en_quotes.author: Henry Miller

en_quotes.quote: You don't need money to be creative. The ghetto builds champions every day
en_quotes.author: DJ Snake

en_quotes.quote: I know you don't always need to spend a ton of money to be stylish
en_quotes.author: Mark Indelicato

en_quotes.quote: Time is more value than money. You can get more money, but you cannot get more time
en_quotes.author: Jim Rohn

en_quotes.quote: Money is in some respects life's fire: it is a very excellent servant, but a terrible master
en_quotes.author: P. T. Barnum

en_quotes.quote: Money can't buy life
en_quotes.author: Bob Marley

en_quotes.quote: No complaint... is more common than that of a scarcity of money
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: You shouldn't have to have money to have a luxury fragrance
en_quotes.author: Lady Gaga

en_quotes.quote: I know all I really wanna do is get money and take care of my family
en_quotes.author: Meek Mill

en_quotes.quote: The money in politics is a cash cow for the media
en_quotes.author: Noam Chomsky

en_quotes.quote: In real estate, you make 10% of your money because you're a genius and 90% because you catch a great wave
en_quotes.author: Jeff Greene

en_quotes.quote: If I could only get people to rub my belly for good lucky and then throw money in my fountain, it'd be a perfect world
en_quotes.author: Christopher Meloni

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather have money and be broken-hearted than be broke and broken-hearted
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: I never saw a lawyer yet who would admit he was making money
en_quotes.author: Mary Roberts Rinehart

en_quotes.quote: I've always said money may buy you a fine dog, but only love can make it wag its tail
en_quotes.author: Kinky Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Money may not buy happiness, but it can damn well give it!
en_quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

en_quotes.quote: When I was young I thought that money was the most important thing in life; now that I am old I know that it is
en_quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

en_quotes.quote: The hardest thing to understand in the world is the income tax
en_quotes.author: Albert Einstein

en_quotes.quote: The key to making money is to stay invested
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: I've always thought anyone can make money. Making a life worth living, that's the real test
en_quotes.author: Robert Fulghum

en_quotes.quote: The flood of money that gushes into politics today is a pollution of democracy
en_quotes.author: Theodore White

en_quotes.quote: Those who are of the opinion that money will do everything may reasonably be expected to do everything for money
en_quotes.author: Edward Wood, 1st Earl of Halifax

en_quotes.quote: The nice thing about the gallery shows is that without having to pay any money you can just go and see it
en_quotes.author: Yoko Ono

en_quotes.quote: The problem is not that people are taxed too little, the problem is that government spends too much
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: A business that makes nothing but money is a poor business
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Making money is a happiness. And that's a great incentive. Making other people happy is a super-happiness
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Yunus

en_quotes.quote: To get rich, you have to be making money while you're asleep
en_quotes.author: David Bailey

en_quotes.quote: You've got to tell your money what to do or it will leave
en_quotes.author: Dave Ramsey

en_quotes.quote: Money is not the only answer, but it makes a difference
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: Your sanity is harder to get back than money or contacts. You are the magic. You are the art. You can't lose that
en_quotes.author: Esperanza Spalding

en_quotes.quote: The highest use of capital is not to make more money, but to make money do more for the betterment of life
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Time is money. Wasted time means wasted money means trouble
en_quotes.author: Shirley Temple

en_quotes.quote: The way to make money is to buy when blood is running in the streets
en_quotes.author: John D. Rockefeller

en_quotes.quote: I'm hopeless with money; I simply spend what I've got
en_quotes.author: Freddie Mercury

en_quotes.quote: I hope to be like Bill Gates, bro. With all the money in the world
en_quotes.author: Young Thug

en_quotes.quote: The time making money should be greater than the time that you are spending money
en_quotes.author: Sophia Amoruso

en_quotes.quote: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship
en_quotes.author: Jackie Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: People say money ain't nothing; money is basically everything
en_quotes.author: Meek Mill

en_quotes.quote: You can tell a lot about a man's character by watching him win or lose money
en_quotes.author: Molly Bloom

en_quotes.quote: No money on earth can buy the love and affection that has been given to me by a grateful nation
en_quotes.author: Abdul Qadeer Khan

en_quotes.quote: Liking money like I like it, is nothing less than mysticism. Money is a glory
en_quotes.author: Salvador Dali

en_quotes.quote: Half the money I spend on advertising is wasted; the trouble is, I don't know which half
en_quotes.author: John Wanamaker

en_quotes.quote: Money is a poor man's credit card
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: My goal wasn't to make a ton of money. It was to build good computers
en_quotes.author: Steve Wozniak

en_quotes.quote: Corruption, money laundering, and tax evasion are global problems, not just challenges for developing countries
en_quotes.author: Sri Mulyani Indrawati

en_quotes.quote: We have the best government that money can buy
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: The lack of money is the root of all evil
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: We learned many years ago that the rich may have money, but the poor have time
en_quotes.author: Cesar Chavez

en_quotes.quote: It is a kind of spiritual snobbery that makes people think they can be happy without money
en_quotes.author: Albert Camus

en_quotes.quote: Nowadays nothing but money counts: a fortune brings honors, friendships; the poor man everywhere lies low
en_quotes.author: Ovid

en_quotes.quote: First and foremost I am a drummer. After that, I'm other things... But I didn't play drums to make money
en_quotes.author: Ringo Starr

en_quotes.quote: Money doesn't talk, it swears
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Happiness is nothing but good health and freedom, and money is the single best way you can buy your freedom
en_quotes.author: Scott Adams

en_quotes.quote: Money is not required to buy one necessity of the soul
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: If you stop at general math, you're only going to make general math money
en_quotes.author: Snoop Dogg

en_quotes.quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than he is of his principles
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Making money is a hobby that will complement any other hobbies you have, beautifully
en_quotes.author: Scott Alexander

en_quotes.quote: It's better to waste money, than it is to waste time. You can always get more money
en_quotes.author: Hal Sparks

en_quotes.quote: I have no one to leave the money to. I'm a single man. I like spending my money
en_quotes.author: Elton John

en_quotes.quote: The money's the same, whether you earn it or scam it
en_quotes.author: Bobby Heenan

en_quotes.quote: What counts the most for women is having the confidence to make your own money
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: Life started getting good when I started making money
en_quotes.author: Balthazar Getty

en_quotes.quote: Money, not morality, is the principle commerce of civilized nations
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: Recession is when a neighbor loses his job. Depression is when you lose yours
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: Don't matter how much money you got, there's only two kinds of people: there's saved people and there's lost people
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: Time well spent results in more money to spend, more money to save, and more time to vacation
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: A little thought and a little kindness are often worth more than a great deal of money
en_quotes.author: John Ruskin

en_quotes.quote: There are people who have money and people who are rich
en_quotes.author: Coco Chanel

en_quotes.quote: If women didn't exist, all the money in the world would have no meaning
en_quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

en_quotes.quote: Money is like an arm or leg - use it or lose it
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Yes, money is important. But it's all about the creative process
en_quotes.author: Travis Scott

en_quotes.quote: The way money goes so fast these days, they should paint racing stripes on it
en_quotes.author: Mark Russell

en_quotes.quote: Profit is sweet, even if it comes from deception
en_quotes.author: Sophocles

en_quotes.quote: Advertising is totally unnecessary. Unless you hope to make money
en_quotes.author: Jef I. Richards

en_quotes.quote: I don't care about having money. It's about being happy, man
en_quotes.author: Skrillex

en_quotes.quote: Flattery is a kind of bad money, to which our vanity gives us currency
en_quotes.author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: I need to make money for my family and my future family. I'm not a YOLO person
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: Writing is like prostitution. First you do it for love, and then for a few close friends, and then for money
en_quotes.author: Moliere

en_quotes.quote: Life is a game. Money is how we keep score
en_quotes.author: Ted Turner

en_quotes.quote: Money is something that keeps you alive and healthy and just keeps you focused. It's the drive. It's the passion
en_quotes.author: Travis Scott

en_quotes.quote: Money and women are the most sought after and the least known about of any two things we have
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: My fat never made me less money
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Money will buy a pretty good dog, but it won't buy the wag of his tail
en_quotes.author: Josh Billings

en_quotes.quote: A fool and his money are soon parted
en_quotes.author: Thomas Tusser

en_quotes.quote: You can't reverse fame. You can lose all the money, but you'll never lose people knowing you
en_quotes.author: J. Cole

en_quotes.quote: Time and money spent in helping men to do more for themselves is far better than mere giving
en_quotes.author: Henry Ford

en_quotes.quote: Studying is something I really love doing, and I just hope to have enough money for tuition
en_quotes.author: Alexandra Kosteniuk

en_quotes.quote: It costs a lot of money to look this cheap
en_quotes.author: Dolly Parton

en_quotes.quote: Money doesn't make you happy. I now have $50 million but I was just as happy when I had $48 million
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: Money without brains is always dangerous
en_quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

en_quotes.quote: A wise person should have money in their head, but not in their heart
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: Fortune is like glass - the brighter the glitter, the more easily broken
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: To be honest, I was born in luxury. I never saw the dearth of money, so money is not something which motivates me
en_quotes.author: Ranbir Kapoor

en_quotes.quote: I'm sick of giving creeps money off my soul
en_quotes.author: Bob Dylan

en_quotes.quote: If you got the money honey I got the time and when you run out of money honey I run out of time
en_quotes.author: Willie Nelson

en_quotes.quote: I don't want to make money, I just want to be wonderful
en_quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

en_quotes.quote: Friends and acquaintances are the surest passport to fortune
en_quotes.author: Arthur Schopenhauer

en_quotes.quote: Money takes wings. The only thing that endures is character
en_quotes.author: O. J. Simpson

en_quotes.quote: Greed is not a financial issue. It's a heart issue
en_quotes.author: Andy Stanley

en_quotes.quote: Money is not God, and human dignity is very important
en_quotes.author: Jim Brown

en_quotes.quote: The modern banking system manufactures money out of nothing
en_quotes.author: Josiah Stamp

en_quotes.quote: I want everybody to get money
en_quotes.author: Playboi Carti

en_quotes.quote: Money differs from an automobile or mistress in being equally important to those who have it and those who do not
en_quotes.author: John Kenneth Galbraith

en_quotes.quote: The only reason I'm in Hollywood is that I don't have the moral courage to refuse the money
en_quotes.author: Marlon Brando

en_quotes.quote: My happiness doesn't come from money or fame. My happiness comes from seeing life without struggle
en_quotes.author: Nicki Minaj

en_quotes.quote: There is no such thing as a good tax
en_quotes.author: Unknown

en_quotes.quote: I waste a lot of money buying the same pair of shoes
en_quotes.author: Big Sean

en_quotes.quote: In school, my favorite subject was math. That's where I learned to count money
en_quotes.author: French Montana

en_quotes.quote: Money changes all the iron rules into rubber bands
en_quotes.author: Ryszard Kapuscinski

en_quotes.quote: Money is better than poverty, if only for financial reasons
en_quotes.author: Woody Allen

en_quotes.quote: If an original piece of wardrobe came up from Star Wars, I'd probably spend a lot of money on it
en_quotes.author: Johnny Vegas

en_quotes.quote: When I got my Oprah money, the first thing I bought was a really nice electronic bidet toilet seat
en_quotes.author: Zach Anner

en_quotes.quote: There is a gigantic difference between earning a great deal of money and being rich
en_quotes.author: Marlene Dietrich

en_quotes.quote: I am suspicious of what people might want from me. Do they like me, or my money?
en_quotes.author: Petra Stunt

en_quotes.quote: If you deal with information, you need the Internet. If you deal with money, you need to deal with blockchains
en_quotes.author: Balaji Srinivasan

en_quotes.quote: There was a time when a fool and his money were soon parted, but now it happens to everybody
en_quotes.author: Adlai Stevenson I

en_quotes.quote: Money is just a way of keeping score
en_quotes.author: H. L. Hunt

en_quotes.quote: People don't have time to wait for somebody to paint their portraits anymore. The money is in photography
en_quotes.author: Robert Mapplethorpe

en_quotes.quote: It is usually people in the money business, finance, and international trade that are really rich
en_quotes.author: Robin Leach

en_quotes.quote: That money talks, I'll not deny, I heard it once: It said, 'Goodbye'
en_quotes.author: Richard Armour

en_quotes.quote: Advertising is the art of convincing people to spend money they don't have for something they don't need
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: Honesty is the best policy - when there is money in it
en_quotes.author: Mark Twain

en_quotes.quote: I always was a rich person because money's not related to happiness
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: To have done anything just for money is to have been truly idle
en_quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

en_quotes.quote: My pride fell with my fortunes
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Neither a borrower nor a lender be
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: For I can raise no money by vile means
en_quotes.author: William Shakespeare

en_quotes.quote: Making money is certainly the one addiction I cannot shake
en_quotes.author: Felix Dennis

en_quotes.quote: Money often costs too much
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: Being willing to donate the taxpayers' money is not the same as being willing to put your own money where your mouth is
en_quotes.author: Thomas Sowell

en_quotes.quote: My dad wouldn't buy me tight pants. I had to get my own money to buy them
en_quotes.author: Young Thug

en_quotes.quote: A man in debt is so far a slave
en_quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

en_quotes.quote: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions; he had money as well
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: You reach a point where you don't work for money
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: No hours, nor amount of labor, nor amount of money would deter me from giving the best that there was in me
en_quotes.author: Colonel Sanders

en_quotes.quote: I went to the bank and asked to borrow a cup of money. They said, 'What for?' I said, 'I'm going to buy some sugar.'
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: There's enough money for everybody. See, I can't do what Yachty does. But then again, Yachty can't do what I do
en_quotes.author: Lil Uzi Vert

en_quotes.quote: If you would know the value of money, go and try to borrow some
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I can make more generals, but horses cost money
en_quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

en_quotes.quote: Time is more valuable than money, because time is irreplaceable
en_quotes.author: John C. Maxwell

en_quotes.quote: Ben Franklin may have discovered electricity- but it is the man who invented the meter who made the money
en_quotes.author: Earl Warren

en_quotes.quote: I wasn't a hacker for the money, and it wasn't to cause damage
en_quotes.author: Kevin Mitnick

en_quotes.quote: He that is of the opinion money will do everything may well be suspected of doing everything for money
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: A penny saved is a penny earned
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Those have a short Lent who owe money to be paid at Easter
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Politics has become so expensive that it takes a lot of money even to be defeated
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: If we command our wealth, we shall be rich and free; if our wealth commands us, we are poor indeed
en_quotes.author: Edmund Burke

en_quotes.quote: I don't fight for the money. I fight for my legacy. I fight for history. I fight for my people
en_quotes.author: Khabib Nurmagomedov

en_quotes.quote: The use of money is all the advantage there is in having it
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: Remember that credit is money
en_quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

en_quotes.quote: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true
en_quotes.author: Walt Disney

en_quotes.quote: One day a guy tried to rob me on the street, and I had no money. So I charged him
en_quotes.author: Steven Wright

en_quotes.quote: Money isn't the most important thing in life, but it's reasonably close to oxygen on the 'gotta have it' scale
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Whoever controls the volume of money in any country is absolute master of all industry and commerce
en_quotes.author: James A. Garfield

en_quotes.quote: I have always spent my time more preciously than my money
en_quotes.author: Nathan Phillips

en_quotes.quote: Bank failures are caused by depositors who don't deposit enough money to cover losses due to mismanagement
en_quotes.author: Dan Quayle

en_quotes.quote: In any investment, you expect to have fun and make money
en_quotes.author: Michael Jordan

en_quotes.quote: Never spend your money before you have earned it
en_quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

en_quotes.quote: We at Chrysler borrow money the old-fashioned way. We pay it back
en_quotes.author: Lee Iacocca

en_quotes.quote: Money won't make you happy... but everybody wants to find out for themselves
en_quotes.author: Zig Ziglar

en_quotes.quote: Alimony is like buying hay for a dead horse
en_quotes.author: Groucho Marx

en_quotes.quote: So you think that money is the root of all evil. Have you ever asked what is the root of all money?
en_quotes.author: Ayn Rand

en_quotes.quote: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position
en_quotes.author: Christopher Marlowe

en_quotes.quote: Recommend virtue to your children; it alone, not money, can make them happy. I speak from experience
en_quotes.author: Ludwig van Beethoven

en_quotes.quote: Lack of money is the root of all evil
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it helps you look for it in a lot more places
en_quotes.author: Milton Berle

en_quotes.quote: If you are in the world of business, that means you are in the business of making money
en_quotes.author: Stephen A. Smith

en_quotes.quote: We don't manage money for anyone else. We bear responsibility only for our own risks
en_quotes.author: Suleyman Kerimov

en_quotes.quote: I've got all the money I'll ever need, if I die by four o'clock
en_quotes.author: Henny Youngman

en_quotes.quote: All money is a matter of belief
en_quotes.author: Adam Smith

en_quotes.quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love
en_quotes.author: Judy Garland

en_quotes.quote: Very few people can afford to be poor
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: When a man says money can do anything, that settles it: he hasn't got any
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: We are the only real aristocracy in the world: the aristocracy of money
en_quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

en_quotes.quote: Government always finds a need for whatever money it gets
en_quotes.author: Ronald Reagan

en_quotes.quote: I'd like to live as a poor man with lots of money
en_quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

en_quotes.quote: Making money is art and working is art and good business is the best art
en_quotes.author: Andy Warhol

en_quotes.quote: I don't care half so much about making money as I do about making my point, and coming out ahead
en_quotes.author: Cornelius Vanderbilt

en_quotes.quote: I have a passion for music; I love music. But I also have a passion for money and paying my bills
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: Of course, to have money is just great because you can do what you think is important to you
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: A fool and his money are soon elected
en_quotes.author: Will Rogers

en_quotes.quote: The circulation of confidence is better than the circulation of money
en_quotes.author: James Madison

en_quotes.quote: I don't make deals for the money. I've got enough, much more than I'll ever need. I do it to do it
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: I'm worth far too much money. I don't need anybody's money
en_quotes.author: Donald Trump

en_quotes.quote: A bank is a place that will lend you money if you can prove that you don't need it
en_quotes.author: Bob Hope

en_quotes.quote: I mean, I do think at a certain point you've made enough money
en_quotes.author: Barack Obama

en_quotes.quote: I'm not interested in making money. It's just that with my talent, I'm cursed with it
en_quotes.author: Noel Gallagher

en_quotes.quote: Time is money, especially when you are talking to a lawyer or buying a commercial
en_quotes.author: Frank Dane

en_quotes.quote: A billion here, a billion there, and pretty soon you're talking about real money
en_quotes.author: Everett Dirksen

en_quotes.quote: Money's a horrid thing to follow, but a charming thing to meet
en_quotes.author: Henry James

en_quotes.quote: Don't let making a living prevent you from making a life
en_quotes.author: John Wooden

en_quotes.quote: I'd have stopped writing years ago if it were for the money
en_quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

en_quotes.quote: If you want to reap financial blessings, you have to sow financially
en_quotes.author: Joel Osteen

en_quotes.quote: My principles are more important than the money or my title
en_quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

en_quotes.quote: Sometimes you have to make a movie to make money
en_quotes.author: Robin Williams

en_quotes.quote: Bankers know that history is inflationary and that money is the last thing a wise man will hoard
en_quotes.author: Will Durant

en_quotes.quote: And plenty makes us poor
en_quotes.author: John Dryden

en_quotes.quote: I'm enjoying the money, the big house, the cars; what ghetto kid wouldn't?
en_quotes.author: O. J. Simpson

en_quotes.quote: The day, water, sun, moon, night - I do not have to purchase these things with money
en_quotes.author: Plautus

en_quotes.quote: It's morally wrong to allow a sucker to keep his money
en_quotes.author: W. C. Fields

en_quotes.quote: No, not rich. I am a poor man with money, which is not the same thing
en_quotes.author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

en_quotes.quote: Living a frugal lifestyle gives you the opportunity to invest more money towards your future
en_quotes.author: John Rampton

en_quotes.quote: Well-spent aid money is saving lives for a few thousand dollars per life saved
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: I'm a businesswoman who's serious about her money. I want an empire
en_quotes.author: Toni Braxton

en_quotes.quote: You use your money to buy privacy because during most of your life you aren't allowed to be normal
en_quotes.author: Johnny Depp

en_quotes.quote: The thing that differentiates man from animals is money
en_quotes.author: Gertrude Stein

en_quotes.quote: Here I am paying big money to you writers and what for? All you do is change the words
en_quotes.author: Samuel Goldwyn

en_quotes.quote: The chief value of money lies in the fact that one lives in a world in which it is overestimated
en_quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

en_quotes.quote: I found this out over the years, that racism is a thinly veiled disguise over economics and money. It really is
en_quotes.author: Quincy Jones

en_quotes.quote: If saving money is wrong, I don't want to be right!
en_quotes.author: William Shatner

en_quotes.quote: Most men love money and security more, and creation and construction less, as they get older
en_quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

en_quotes.quote: I'm not very bright about money. I'm not domestic either. If I don't learn how to cook, maybe I won't have to
en_quotes.author: Natalie Wood

en_quotes.quote: Pennies do not come from heaven. They have to be earned here on earth
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Neither soldiers nor money can defend a king but only friends won by good deeds, merit, and honesty
en_quotes.author: Sallust

en_quotes.quote: The man who won't loan money isn't going to have many friends - or need them
en_quotes.author: Wilt Chamberlain

en_quotes.quote: Benjamin Franklin may have discovered electricity, but it was the man who invented the meter who made the money
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: We've got to put a lot of money into changing behavior
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: I'm enjoying life at my fullest. Sometimes you realize that money isn't everything
en_quotes.author: Rey Mysterio

en_quotes.quote: The faster I make a lot of money, the faster I can have these kids I want
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: That's why I be so careful with my money and always try to invest. I see people who have it all and then lose it
en_quotes.author: Cardi B

en_quotes.quote: It's a long, slow sunset for ink-on-paper magazines, but sunsets can produce vast sums of money
en_quotes.author: Felix Dennis

en_quotes.quote: I've made all my money on my own without my family and I work very hard
en_quotes.author: Paris Hilton

en_quotes.quote: I have plenty of money, unlike other Hollywood celebrities or athletes that have not invested well
en_quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

en_quotes.quote: A man is usually more careful of his money than of his principles
en_quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: I have always been afraid of banks
en_quotes.author: Andrew Jackson

en_quotes.quote: You lose your individuality a huge amount when you have no money, and I certainly had that experience
en_quotes.author: J. K. Rowling

en_quotes.quote: Business, that's easily defined - it's other people's money
en_quotes.author: Peter Drucker

en_quotes.quote: There's no such thing as a free lunch
en_quotes.author: Milton Friedman

en_quotes.quote: Measure your wealth by what you'd have left if you lost all your money
en_quotes.author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

en_quotes.quote: New York City is a great monument to the power of money and greed... a race for rent
en_quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright

en_quotes.quote: I like to help women to spend not a lot of money - to feel powerful, elegant, glamorous, to feel good about themselves
en_quotes.author: Melania Trump

en_quotes.quote: I was never money conscious. I would never have succeeded if I thought I was going to be a millionaire
en_quotes.author: Ralph Lauren

en_quotes.quote: I am happy to make money. I want to make more money, make more music, eat Big Macs and drink Budweisers
en_quotes.author: Kid Rock

en_quotes.quote: Business? It's quite simple; it's other people's money
en_quotes.author: Alexandre Dumas

en_quotes.quote: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake
en_quotes.author: Margaret Thatcher

en_quotes.quote: Well private money can take risks in a way that government money often isn't willing to
en_quotes.author: Bill Gates

en_quotes.quote: The money never mattered. I'm not kidding you. It hasn't really brought me any kind of happiness
en_quotes.author: Michael Buble

en_quotes.quote: There can only be democracy when money is not allowed to be spent in Politics
en_quotes.author: Imran Khan

en_quotes.quote: A woman must have money and a room of her own if she is to write fiction
en_quotes.author: Virginia Woolf

en_quotes.quote: You have to go broke three times to learn how to make a living
en_quotes.author: Casey Stengel

en_quotes.quote: Money will not give you happiness; it's part of the key
en_quotes.author: Logic

en_quotes.quote: No one's ever achieved financial fitness with a January resolution that's abandoned by February
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: We are going as fast as we can as soon as we can. We're in a race against time, until we run out of money
en_quotes.author: Jack Nicholson

en_quotes.quote: Brigands demand your money or your life; women require both
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: I've never chased money. It's always been about what I can do to motivate and inspire people
en_quotes.author: Tyler Perry

en_quotes.quote: The importance of money flows from it being a link between the present and the future
en_quotes.author: John Maynard Keynes

en_quotes.quote: After a certain point, money is meaningless. It ceases to be the goal. The game is what counts
en_quotes.author: Aristotle Onassis

en_quotes.quote: I have nothing against investment banking, but it's like massaging money rather than creating money
en_quotes.author: Michio Kaku

en_quotes.quote: Thought, not money, is the real business capital
en_quotes.author: Harvey S. Firestone

en_quotes.quote: Time will take your money, but money won't buy time
en_quotes.author: James Taylor

en_quotes.quote: Isn't it a shame that future generations can't be here to see all the wonderful things we're doing with their money?
en_quotes.author: Earl Wilson

en_quotes.quote: The curse of covetousness is that it destroys manhood by substituting money for character
en_quotes.author: Lucy Larcom

en_quotes.quote: We're not making records for the fun of it; we're in it to make money
en_quotes.author: Eazy-E

en_quotes.quote: We do not attract Russian money to Luxembourg with high interest rates
en_quotes.author: Jean-Claude Juncker

en_quotes.quote: What's my motto when it comes to money? Don't put so much emphasis on it!
en_quotes.author: Janice Dickinson

en_quotes.quote: I don't spend much money on clothes; I never did
en_quotes.author: Lauren Hutton

en_quotes.quote: We can't spend money on programs just because they sound good... Meals on Wheels sounds great
en_quotes.author: Mick Mulvaney

en_quotes.quote: How do you make money? Spinoffs, split-ups, liquidations, mergers and acquisitions
en_quotes.author: Mario Gabelli

en_quotes.quote: Because women still earn just 77 cents for every dollar men make. Those pennies add up to real money
en_quotes.author: Lilly Ledbetter

en_quotes.quote: It's our money, and we're free to spend it any way we please
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: I've had an exciting time; I married for love and got a little money along with it
en_quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

en_quotes.quote: Money is our madness, our vast collective madness
en_quotes.author: D. H. Lawrence

en_quotes.quote: If you can count your money, you don't have a billion dollars
en_quotes.author: J. Paul Getty

en_quotes.quote: Money makes your life easier. If you're lucky to have it, you're lucky
en_quotes.author: Al Pacino

en_quotes.quote: All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment
en_quotes.author: Ray Kroc

en_quotes.quote: Even if actors ask for more money, will producers fulfill their demands? They might just show us the door
en_quotes.author: Amruta Khanvilkar

en_quotes.quote: A good reputation is more valuable than money
en_quotes.author: Publilius Syrus

en_quotes.quote: The most efficient labor-saving device is still money
en_quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

en_quotes.quote: No man's credit is as good as his money
en_quotes.author: John Dewey

en_quotes.quote: If I have enough money to eat I'm good
en_quotes.author: Shia LaBeouf

en_quotes.quote: I'm going to win so much money this year, my caddie will make the top twenty money winner's list
en_quotes.author: Lee Trevino

en_quotes.quote: Men make counterfeit money; in many more cases, money makes counterfeit men
en_quotes.author: Sydney J. Harris

en_quotes.quote: I have turned down a lot of money for things that would have made me feel cheesy
en_quotes.author: Tom Petty

en_quotes.quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept
en_quotes.author: Samuel Butler

en_quotes.quote: Money is to my social existence what health is to my body
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: Trying to take money out of politics is like trying to take jumping out of basketball
en_quotes.author: Bill Bradley

en_quotes.quote: Money couldn't buy friends, but you got a better class of enemy
en_quotes.author: Spike Milligan

en_quotes.quote: Money will find you if people believe in your message
en_quotes.author: Roger Ailes

en_quotes.quote: A lot of people got a lot of money around Kansas City, Missouri. If we didn't, KC Trends would be out of business
en_quotes.author: Tech N9ne

en_quotes.quote: Money? How did I lose it? I never did lose it. I just never knew where it went
en_quotes.author: Edith Piaf

en_quotes.quote: Batman. I like the idea that if I had enough money, time, and vengeance, I could become him
en_quotes.author: Todd Howard

en_quotes.quote: There's just one thing I can't figure out. My income tax!
en_quotes.author: Nat King Cole

en_quotes.quote: Who covets more is evermore a slave
en_quotes.author: Robert Herrick

en_quotes.quote: Nobody deserves this much money - certainly not an actor
en_quotes.author: Jack Lemmon

en_quotes.quote: Nothing is more dangerous to men than a sudden change of fortune
en_quotes.author: Quintilian

en_quotes.quote: I don't like money actually, but it quiets the nerves
en_quotes.author: Joe E. Lewis

en_quotes.quote: We are now after 7 months operation making money here
en_quotes.author: Henry Wells

en_quotes.quote: I describe Bitcoin as 'the Skype of money.'
en_quotes.author: Adam Draper

en_quotes.quote: The function of the press in society is to inform, but its role in society is to make money
en_quotes.author: A. J. Liebling

en_quotes.quote: I'm determined to be contented, and having plenty of money from working makes it easier for me
en_quotes.author: Karen Carpenter

en_quotes.quote: Money is always transitively valued. More money is supposedly always better than less money
en_quotes.author: Gregory Bateson

en_quotes.quote: During the late '20s my father left us. My mother was in a complete hole with no money, and we were evicted
en_quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

en_quotes.quote: Money is not real. It is a conscious agreement on measuring value
en_quotes.author: John Ralston Saul

en_quotes.quote: Do what you love and the money will follow
en_quotes.author: Marsha Sinetar

en_quotes.quote: A simple fact that is hard to learn is that the time to save money is when you have some
en_quotes.author: Joe Moore

en_quotes.quote: It's all about the money
en_quotes.author: Joe Jackson

en_quotes.quote: A man with money is no match against a man on a mission
en_quotes.author: Doyle Brunson

en_quotes.quote: I have long believed taxpayers make better use of their money than the government ever could
en_quotes.author: Kay Bailey Hutchison

en_quotes.quote: People who lose money always need someone to blame
en_quotes.author: James Chanos

en_quotes.quote: The magic of living life for me is, and always has been, the magic of living on the land, not in the magic of money
en_quotes.author: Burt Shavitz

en_quotes.quote: If the money we donate helps one child or can ease the pain of one parent, those funds are well spent
en_quotes.author: Carl Karcher

en_quotes.quote: Art for art's sake, money for God's sake
en_quotes.author: Simon Raven

en_quotes.quote: Poverty breeds lack of self-reliance
en_quotes.author: Daniel De Leon

en_quotes.quote: Don't spend money on extravagant things like cars and big vacations. Spend it on things that are really fun
en_quotes.author: Justin Flom

en_quotes.quote: Asking people for money is giving them the opportunity to put their resources at the disposal of the Kingdom
en_quotes.author: Henri Nouwen

en_quotes.quote: It is more rewarding to watch money change the world than watch it accumulate
en_quotes.author: Gloria Steinem

en_quotes.quote: Affluence creates poverty
en_quotes.author: Marshall McLuhan

en_quotes.quote: Money isn't everything. Do you get married because of money? Do you have kids because of money?
en_quotes.author: Walter Payton

en_quotes.quote: A wise man should have money in his head, but not in his heart
en_quotes.author: Jonathan Swift

en_quotes.quote: There is nothing so habit-forming as money
en_quotes.author: Don Marquis

en_quotes.quote: A fool and her money are soon courted
en_quotes.author: Helen Rowland

en_quotes.quote: Many people are in the dark when it comes to money, and I'm going to turn on the lights
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: The foundation of a financial fresh start actually has nothing to do with money or specific financial dos and don'ts
en_quotes.author: Suze Orman

en_quotes.quote: Many folks think they aren't good at earning money, when what they don't know is how to use it
en_quotes.author: Frank A. Clark

en_quotes.quote: Money is a strange business. People who haven't got it aim it strongly. People who have are full of troubles
en_quotes.author: Ayrton Senna

en_quotes.quote: I am fiercely loyal to those willing to put their money where my mouth is
en_quotes.author: Paul Harvey

en_quotes.quote: All riches have their origin in mind. Wealth is in ideas - not money
en_quotes.author: Robert Collier

en_quotes.quote: I'd rather lose my own money than someone else's
en_quotes.author: Dean Kamen

en_quotes.quote: Money: power at its most liquid
en_quotes.author: Mason Cooley

en_quotes.quote: All I ask is the chance to prove that money can't make me happy
en_quotes.author: Spike Milligan

en_quotes.quote: It is a waste of money to help those who show no desire to help themselves
en_quotes.author: Taylor Caldwell

en_quotes.quote: A woman's best protection is a little money of her own
en_quotes.author: Clare Boothe Luce

en_quotes.quote: Wealth flows from energy and ideas
en_quotes.author: William Feather

en_quotes.quote: The greatest luxury of riches is that they enable you to escape so much good advice
en_quotes.author: Arthur Helps

en_quotes.quote: I'm not broke. Like everybody else, I owe money
en_quotes.author: Marlee Matlin

en_quotes.quote: If God has allowed me to earn so much money, it is because He knows I give it all away
en_quotes.author: Edith Piaf

en_quotes.quote: Money equals freedom
en_quotes.author: Kevin O'Leary

en_quotes.quote: It's easier to force feed people than it is to give 'em what they want. It makes more money
en_quotes.author: Merle Haggard

en_quotes.quote: The safe way to double your money is to fold it over once and put it in your pocket
en_quotes.author: Kin Hubbard

en_quotes.quote: I thought using the Ayatollah's money to support the Nicaraguan resistance was a neat idea
en_quotes.author: Oliver North

en_quotes.quote: We like to get money. Whoever wants to work with us and make some money, let's do it
en_quotes.author: Offset

en_quotes.quote: I never do anything to make money. I do make money, but that's because I do something. Big difference
en_quotes.author: Varg Vikernes

en_quotes.quote: Money is a mechanism for control
en_quotes.author: David Korten

en_quotes.quote: A fool and his money get a lot of publicity
en_quotes.author: Al Bernstein

en_quotes.quote: Research indicates that most women want their man to earn more than they do
en_quotes.author: Laura Schlessinger

en_quotes.quote: Wealth should not be seized, but the god-given is much better
en_quotes.author: Hesiod

en_quotes.quote: If you try to make money doing something you're not enjoying, it's a hard way to make money
en_quotes.author: E. Joseph Cossman

en_quotes.quote: Money just draws flies
en_quotes.author: Mahalia Jackson

en_quotes.quote: Civilized countries generally adopt gold or silver or both as money
en_quotes.author: Alfred Marshall

en_quotes.quote: I, Joan Crawford, I believe in the dollar. Everything I earn, I spend
en_quotes.author: Joan Crawford

en_quotes.quote: You know, a lot of people are just interested in, in building a company so they can make money and get out
en_quotes.author: Arthur Rock

en_quotes.quote: Sooner or later, we sell out for money
en_quotes.author: Tony Randall

en_quotes.quote: It is money, money, money! Not ideas, not principles, but money that reigns supreme in American politics
en_quotes.author: Robert Byrd

en_quotes.quote: Marrying into money was not a good thing for me
en_quotes.author: Anna Nicole Smith

en_quotes.quote: As long as I can make lots of money in other businesses, I'll continue to subsidize my own work
en_quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

en_quotes.quote: I was never sloppy with other people's money. Only my own. Because I figure, well, you can be
en_quotes.author: Francis Ford Coppola

en_quotes.quote: Real riches are the riches possessed inside
en_quotes.author: B. C. Forbes

en_quotes.quote: As human beings, we're very materialistic and have all this stuff - furs and cars and diamonds and money
en_quotes.author: Smokey Robinson

en_quotes.quote: Sudden money is going from zero to two hundred dollars a week. The rest doesn't count
en_quotes.author: Neil Simon

en_quotes.quote: A man who gives his children habits of industry provides for them better than by giving them fortune
en_quotes.author: Richard Whately

en_quotes.quote: The substitute for knowledge is money
en_quotes.author: Gordon Bethune

en_quotes.quote: In suggesting gifts: Money is appropriate, and one size fits all
en_quotes.author: William Randolph Hearst

en_quotes.quote: If you make a living, if you earn your own money, you're free - however free one can be on this planet
en_quotes.author: Theodore White

en_quotes.quote: Money does not make you happy but it quiets the nerves
en_quotes.author: Sean O'Casey

en_quotes.quote: Anybody who thinks money will make you happy, hasn't got money
en_quotes.author: David Geffen

en_quotes.quote: Don't judge me. I made a lot of money
en_quotes.author: Samantha Bee

en_quotes.quote: I've learned to take jobs as an actress that is meaningful to me because I've never taken a job for the money
en_quotes.author: Emmy Rossum

en_quotes.quote: All my life I knew that there was all the money you could want out there. All you have to do is go after it
en_quotes.author: Curtis Carlson

en_quotes.quote: Wealth and want equally harden the human heart
en_quotes.author: Theodore Parker

en_quotes.quote: I think that focusing on the money, on the business, is not enough
en_quotes.author: Sergei Bubka

en_quotes.quote: If money was my only motivation, I would organize myself differently
en_quotes.author: Placido Domingo

en_quotes.quote: It's a terribly hard job to spend a billion dollars and get your money's worth
en_quotes.author: George M. Humphrey

en_quotes.quote: The creditor hath a better memory than the debtor
en_quotes.author: James Howell

en_quotes.quote: An important lever for sustained action in tackling poverty and reducing hunger is money
en_quotes.author: Gro Harlem Brundtland

en_quotes.quote: I don't think business news is just for old white men with money
en_quotes.author: Neil Cavuto

en_quotes.quote: What counts is what you do with your money, not where it came from
en_quotes.author: Merton Miller

en_quotes.quote: The prize money for first place was $2,800, but I didn't take it because I was still an amateur
en_quotes.author: Tracy Austin

en_quotes.quote: You want 21 percent risk free? Pay off your credit cards
en_quotes.author: Andrew Tobias

en_quotes.quote: Business is other people's money
en_quotes.author: Delphine de Girardin

en_quotes.quote: Many good qualities are not sufficient to balance a single want - the want of money
en_quotes.author: Johann Georg Zimmermann
